content.detailedDescription:
i was hanging with two close and dear friends on my rooftop at 429 am thursday morning. i live in the hip williamsburg area of  brooklyn. my friends and i had decided to hang out on my rooftop as to not disturb my roommates who were asleep at the time. i have always been a stargazer and avid fan of the ufo phenomena. i'd never seen anything in the sky that surprised or alarmed me in the past. my two companions have been dating for a long time and we had all lived together and worked together at various points in our lives. i had been listening to my female companion talk about an idea she had for an upcoming photography and art collaboration, i was quite sober at the time, i had driven them to my place from a bar down the street where we had decided to meet to discuss some of our ideas for the project. we had been discussing the idea of working together for some time and being night owls, a '3 am to 3:45 am last call' impromptu meeting was not out of the question. we are all self employed night owls and it is completely normal for any of us to be up at that time. so it's now about 429 am thursday morning and i was listening to my female companion talk about some of her interests and current pursuits in photography. we were awaiting another couple to arrive who would be the models for our proposed shoot. suddenly i felt the urge to turn around and look up at the sky. i saw four seemingly massive  lights hovering quite a distance away from where we were sitting. i live directly across from an enormous corporate verizon building headquarters. i was facing that direction, and the city of manhattan from that perspective would be directly behind me. i was watching the four lights, which appeared at  that moment to be above the bushwick, bedstuy area of brooklyn. i quickly exclaimed my surprise at the four odd luminous bright white lights that were being obscured by a thin cloud covering. i am not a good estimator of distance and size ratio while looking at the sky. it could have been a football field in diameter for all i know. being a ufo enthusiast i immediately hoped for the best, and was practically beaming with delight. perhaps the lights were anywhere from a mile to two miles away. we all began to exclaim how exciting this was, and being photographers and iphone enthusiasts we quickly utilized the video app on our devices. i was so calm and quick to take the film, i felt a bit of adrenaline surge as i hit the red record button, to my delight i began capturing the event on video. what luck, as the four lights began to fade rapidly. then, suddenly,  the same four lights reappeared like magic a bit below and to the left of the original formation. it was an extremely dark night, stars were not visible, and neither were any planes or helicopters. we could not find or think of an explanation for this event. although bewildered and perplexed, we were quite happy to see it, we did not feel danger, we felt that we had seen a classic unidentified flying object. was it aliens from space? maybe, though whatever it was  it sure did put a smile on my face and on the faces of my two companions. i'd wanted to see and capture something like this since i was a small kid. i got my wish. i am very happy to have seen this ariel phenomena, but as all good thing things come to an end, just as soon as i'd noticed that object in the sky, we watched in amazement as it fizzled and faded out into the clouds as if it had never been there. 
happy fourth of july
d.R. july 2nd 2017
content.summary: I was enjoying the night sky and conversing with two friends when i suddenly noticed four luminous lights hovering high in the sky amidst a light cloud covering.

content.detailedDescription: I was eleven  years old. we were staying in a house in auckland and i awoke from my sleep after midnight maybe 1-2am for no reason, i did not need to go to the toilet, there had been no noise. i felt drawn to the lounge window and was mesmerised by this object i saw in the sky. i knew that it couldn't be a plane as it just hovered in the air for few minutes and then would go up on a 45 degree angle, hover again. it was not behaving as any aircraft would, there was no noise. i saw it as a light. it landed across other side of a lake on the grass for short time. i felt as if i was awoken and drawn to go and see it. it seemed strange to me in the morning that i had not thought to wake anyone to see it, itor to get a camera and photograph it, it w as if i was under its spell somehow. in the end it took off at a great speed. in the morning i saw a large round depression in the grass on the other side of the lake. this happened over thirty years ago and i have never forgotten it. just learned about this site so thought i would post my sighting.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I awoke sometime after midnight for no reason and was drawn to lounge window. object was hovering and then going up at 45 degree angle then hovering then again 45 degree another direction hovering. it landed at one point and then took off.

content.detailedDescription:
It was evening and my daughter and i were coming home from the store. we decided to take a drive so we headed out to the sanoran desert national park. it was totally dark but i had my bright lights in as the road has very sharp turns and hills. we were only in the park area for a few minutes when we both noticed a strange neon green thing flying low about level with a large truck. at first i though it may have been a drone but it was pitch black out and in the middle of the desert! we didn't see how anyone could possibly be controlling a drone and saw no other lights. it moved in a very strange way. it was as if we were looking at a flying orb visable to the naked eye. 
i was driving and couldn't stop. 
about 10 feet after we passed this ufo type thing i looked to my left and out of nowhere was this huge neon green glowing balloon shape type thing! i slowed my car way down to catch a good look and it didn't move! it's was about 15 up from the ground or so. the lining of it was totally neon and faded to a pale green toward the inside. the bottom part of this balloon shaped object was dark in color. almost black. it was larger than a mans head. there was a slight breeze outside but this object did not move!!! 
i kept driving as my daughter and i were both trying to figure out what the heck we had just seen! 
we continued to drive and turned around all the way at the desert museum. we didn't see anything the rest of the drive until we had turned around and were back in that area. 
we didn't see anything flying but instead we saw 2 more of the weird glowing neon green things. one on each side of the road but they were set back and low to the ground. 
my daughter and i were pretty freaked out at this point and decided to drive by another time. so we did and they just sat still. glowing neon green. i felt very nervous and anxious at the same time. i stepped on my gas and got the heck out of there! i tried to capture a clear picture but was unable to capture a clear one because it was so dark and i was driving. the blurry thing toward the bottom of the photo is of the green thing. it looks nothing like what we saw. but it's all i've got. i will never forget that image of the green thing staring right at us on the side of the car! it was right by us! 
we drove to that area again this evening just to see if we might see it again but we saw nothing but we both had a very uncomfortable feeling while in that area.
content.summary: Flew like a drone type but it was not. it glowed neon green and moved in a very odd way. then suddenly saw a large version or the green still about 15 feet up from the ground much larger staring at me

content.detailedDescription:
Today my friend sent me these pictures. she said she took them a couple years ago while living in an apt that she thought was haunted. she experience many negative things while living there. 
as i looked over the pictures, she thought that the obvious thing in the second picture was a spirit but as i looked at the first, i immediately saw what i thought was a gray, but looking closer at the eyes, they are reptilian-like. im certain there is another next to it that looks more like a reptilian. i am uploading both of her original pictures and then the edited one where i zoomed in and drew arrows pointing to the grays face, then the reptilians eyes. . its pretty clear. you must zoom on a computer, it doesnt seem to show on a cell phone.
she is willing to talk more about this if needed.
content.summary: Gray/reptilian caught in picture

content.detailedDescription: We were driving over the outer bridge in new jersey and their were so many rainbows so i started taking photos. than i noticed the objects in the photos
content.summary: Driving over outer bridge took a picture of the rainbow and all these things were in the picture

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside watching neighbors set off fireworks. my 17 year old daughter notice a large red light just above the try line to the east. all of us (myself,wife,daughter,son) saw it as it continued to move to the north. this light seemed to move slowly across the sky. the object also made no noise for something of its size. it looked to me larger than an airplane and it would have been close enough to here some engine noise if it was. seek to disappear into the northern sky.
content.summary: Large red light in sky

content.detailedDescription: mother look up and saw  a black object  silent and motionless above her
content.summary: black silent mass

content.detailedDescription:
It was approx. 7:00pm on a wednesday in peterborough, united kingdom, my home for almost 21 years. i was on walking past axiom avenue, a residential area of the city, when i heard the sound of a very low and
loud aircraft. i assumed it was an airplane and that belief remained as i watched the aircraft approx. 3 foot above a two-storey house, which was hidden from my view because of the shape of the roof. i guess i watched
it for approx. 15 seconds, worried how close it was to the house and street. i would have expected an airplane to fly pass and not remain in the same area but i wasn't thinking about that. i was worried about it being so close.

suddenly, the aircraft flew to the right and it became clear within a few seconds that i was seeing no airplane. it was a triangular ufo. it tilted up as it flew to the right and then it stopped in mid-air. it was approx. 6 foot above the 3-storey flat on the right. it covered a large area of the street. i must have watched it in mid-air and motionless for approx. 5 minutes. the only time the ufo made any sound was when i believed it to be an airplane. the ufo had a white light in each corner and they were very much like spotlights, and in the middle there was a large red circle. despite what i was seeing i wasn't scared. during my close encounter i didn't see or hear any traffic, which is surprising considering there are busy roads close to the street. suddenly, the ufo hovered up, again no sound was made and it flew into the sky at a speed, which didn't seem possible and there was no shock wave as far as i could tell. a few seconds afterwards a van drove past, they missed the ufo by just a few seconds. i don't believe i lost any track of time and i haven't had any dreams or nightmares about being abducted by aliens.

i didn't come public with my close encounter until recently and for reasons i can't explain i never researched the ufo until last year. i was watching a documentary on television about the triangular ufo's and since then i have been doing research about them ever since. the x files' finale episode concluded with the ufo above mulder and scully, leading me to think about my experience even more.
content.summary: Triangle ufo approx. 40 feet above me motionless for five minutes approx.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Went  outside to let dogs out at above time listed.
immediately saw patterned lights moving in a structured quartered square seeming to become
out of frequency. immediately noticed change of light at safb (sheddard air force base).As i quickly moved eyes to airbase to see it go black with the air raid sirens screaming. looked at unknown object  as it immediately flicked off like a light switch and was gone. the black out remained but the sirens stopped after a few seconds before. i stared in the direction of departure for an unknown amount of time.  due to the blackout and air raid sirens i saw and heard, for me at least, concretely verified that what i had seen was an actual event and not just unknown lights in the night sky, i know this object was real. real. real real .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Set of lights stationary then seemed to move very unbelievably fast  in a square pattern as if in a quadminted direction . then immediately to approx  the same angle as lights their is a airbase which became suddenly black with air raid sirens blasting .

content.detailedDescription: On a sunday morning flight from albuquerque new mexico to burbank california, we passed by 3 glowing orblike objects that had seemed to be at rest in the middle of nowhere in a very tough to reach part of the desert. i videotaped it and my partner witnessed this as well.
content.summary: I was on a southwest airlines flight going from abq nm to burbank, ca and saw 3 large strange flashing orbs that looked like they had landed in the middle of nowhere possibly by the nm/az border.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my speedboat going out in the harbour and i observed a solid white triangle light, it was going from side to side and slowly descending. my boat was about 50 miles an hour, i thought it was a plane crashing, i got directly under the beam of light. i remember looking up and thinking "hoe huge this thing is" and then in an instant the light went out. the next thing i remember the boat was stopped and i remember turning around going home and feeling very peaceful and at ease but i didn't remember this event until two years ago in 2015 and this happened in the summer of 1992. i remembered this event when i was looking out my bedroom window late at night and saw the same thing in the sky and it made me remember this. i developed a small indented scar on my back and it's been there since 1992 and it never healed or went away.
content.summary: I saw a large light in the sky going from side to side and i got my boat directly under it and then it went out

content.detailedDescription:
See footage, have more. all were video provided was from june 30, 2017.

object changes colour and shape all the time, it remains in the same area for a few hours around 3am over burke mountain, i am located on the adjacent mountain of westwood plateau.

usually always there after 3am and stays to 6am or about then. changes to a transparent with white outline when sun rises and start to climb higher. couldn't find it after a short period of time then a an incredibly bright flash of light happened.

when you zoom in, it goes blurry, so best to magnify it some other way.

all footage was done by my iphone 6.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 days this week it has been present at different times for different periods

content.detailedDescription: Our puppy woke me up a little after 4am. i took her outside and while standing there i noticed flashing lights in the tree line. i assumed it was airplane lights until the 2nd light descended much lower than then light in the tree line. i would say it descended very quickly. they were both bright white lights that flashed every few sec. needless to say i didn't stick around to long. i quickly went back inside.
content.summary: Bright white flashing light at tree line. thought it was airplane lights but one of the lights went lower in the trees.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While shooting sequence of photos to se, i noticed an ufo clear in the picture. it was above humacao town at the time my camera captured the object. i feel these kind of objects are so common in this area that it is not very surprising to find them. also it is very common to see objects moving from south-east to north-northwest crossing humacao to naguabo to "el yunque" rain forest.
content.summary: While shooting sequence of photos to se, i noticed an ufo clear in the picture.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my mom's northern back porch when i noticed as soon as it appeared like a meteor or shooting star. {that descended starting from the northwest at about 10:00 or 11:00 direction wise} it was real bright white light with the biggest and longest most colorful trail of fire from entering earth's atmosphere i have ever seen! it came dangerously close to the ground and seemed to be very large when all of a sudden it exploded in the air with the most beautiful and colorful explosion that threw pieces of it in all directions with every piece that was a different color than the other! but what i thought was crazy was that it made no sound that i heard at all! my immediate thought or feeling was is that this is going to be bad or even a global killer type of asteroid! i was literally in fear for my life and my family's as well, including every body in the immediate area too! i never reported it or recorded the time and date and i don't remember when that happened exactly, but i wish i would've so somebody to go out there and possibly find and recover some of the pieces that exploded off of it i am about 99% sure that if you looked hard enough in that direction, you would be able to recover some of the pieces off of it that hit the ground! i seen some of the colorful pieces fall straight all the way to the ground! and now i feel stupid for not ever doing anything about it! but now that i am a member of mufon, which i am very excited about! i will not let something like that happen again and not just record the date and times but get out there maybe with some kind of radiation detector or something and recover some of the pieces that survived the explosion and made it's way to the ground! it was a very profound moment, but i guess it could've just been a regular 'ol  meteor, but it was the most amazing one i have ever seen! if that's what it was. but it had a very powerful look to it although it made not one sound that i heard, and it happened extremely close to where we were! like maybe a mile give or take away from us! i will never forget it!                                                                                              p.S.Probably just a regular meteor that just didn't make it to the ground!But it was by far the biggest, meanest, most colorful explosion i've ever seen! it was violently scary and graphic!
content.summary: It was the biggest, brightest with long colorful trail of fire meteor like colorful explosion right before it hit the ground with no sound!

content.detailedDescription: 6/30/2017at 8:22 pm , driving north on 217 hwy about exit 5 in beaverton /oregon . in the car my mother , my son  and my sister . we noticed this hughe fire ball up in the sky  , for few seconds like rainbow straight line going up toward the sky ( from the ball toward the sky ), the line desapared very quickly . i ask my son for my cell and snap a photo of the ball. i'm glad i did it very quick as the ball vanished very soon after . all 4 in the car we witness to this . we were very surprised .
content.summary: Very bright and colorful hughe ball, rainbow like line on top , going straight up in the sky for few seconds.

content.detailedDescription: 6/30/2017at 8:22 pm , driving north on 217 hwy about exit 5 in beaverton /oregon . in the car my mother , my son  and my sister . we noticed this hughe fire ball up in the sky  , for few seconds like rainbow straight line going up toward the sky ( from the ball toward the sky ), the line desapared very quickly . i ask my son for my cell and snap a photo of the ball. i'm glad i did it very quick as the ball vanished very soon after . all 4 in the car we witness to this . we were very surprised .

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub looked up towards the south i know it was to south as fly that route often and saw 3 bright stars, at first i thought wow i never  seen those before and watched them for  about 1-2 minutes then one by one the dimmed and vanished . i thought they were stars or at least satellites , but they never moved or blinked (1-2) minutes , and they were bright very bright in the shape of a perfect triangle . they were brighter then 99% of all the other stars .... i never in my life seen anything like it .
content.summary: Three very bright lights in perfect triangle

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and saw a bright white object with flickering red and blue lights.I was afraid cause it was not recognizable to me, so i  took a picture.Over about 2 hours it seemed to get higher in the air but closer to me. it seemed to change shape. i  lost sight of it in full daylight cloud cover.
content.summary: I  went outside i saw a bright white roundish object with flickering red and blue lights.The object gradually ascended a nd changed shape.

content.detailedDescription: Two people seen this. we worked at a prison. i worked a housing unit as unit supervisor. the other was a perimeter patrol officer. i don't remember the actual dates. and other than the incident i didn't think much of it until watching the history channel which i do alot. i seen a drawing of what i thought to be the same thing i seen,so here it is. i was working a unit on i would say on the back side of the prison when a mobil unit called into central control and reported an aircraft hovering over the tree's. the outside supervisor was not able to come at that time. so my shift supervisor called me to go out the back of my unit and report. this is a maximum security prison so all aircraft reports are very serious to us.I stepped out of my unit i would say 2 to 250 yards to my right was an aircraft hovering a tree top height. no lights no sound. the top of the tree's was not being disturbed. i reported to my shift oic that there was an aircraft and it was making no sound just hovering. looks like a airplane and no noticeable markings no lights. it hovered maybe 3 mins then backed away from the institution turning to its left as it did. a report was written and turned into shift oic.  however it was boomerang shape,like the stealth fighter had two white circles oddly larger than what airplane engine's look like where the engine's would be. it made no sound did not disturb not of it's surrounding. no lights at all. 75 miles we have airport. 45 miles we have airbase. really didn't think ufo. however i still don't know what kind of aircraft it was. me an that other officer still talk about that some times even tho i no longer work there. i was there 15 years. and feed back on how many of these type sightings?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like a plane but no sound hover over trees 2 officers seen it.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a restaurant  in the south end of town (southdale & wonderland) meeting up with some old teammates of mine that i hadn't seen in quite awhile so i was very excited to catch up with them. i had ordered food and went outside to make a phone call when i saw the darkest storm clouds i had ever seen in my life. i take notice of almost any type of storm cloud as i have a "theory" that ufos or government aircraft use large storms as cover to practice maneuvers or do battle with one another, who's going to think twice if they see a bright flash and a huge explosion like sound when a storm is above them. i usually take photos of the clouds if i can and this being the darkest i had ever seen i was definitely taking a picture of it. i watched the clouds move for approxamitley 6 minutes before i went back in the the restaurant and told my friends of the crazy storm that was coming in, almost right after i told them i started getting a very anxious feeling in the pit of my stomach and an impending doom psychological feeling. the feeling got so bad that i asked the waitress if i could get my food to go and told my friends that i had to leave despite not having seen them in a while, the whole ride home it "felt" like i was being watched. it wasn't until last week when i was looking through old photos on my computer did i notice the 4 strange lights in the clouds. the lights only appear in the one photo but i have included a second for comparisons.
content.summary: Strange lights in huge storm clouds

content.detailedDescription: Was taking pics of a nice sunset. when i got home and was a little surprised at what i saw. couldn't make it to anywhere more picturesque so i took some pics through the power lines. i remember seeing the round shape and just thinking it was one of the spheres you see attached to the actual power lines you see. when i looked at the pics the sphere only appears to be touching the line in 1 pic. i was in the car but i was in a parking lot not moving. the first picture i just took a regular mode iphone 7plus, the next 3 were in hd. my heart kind of jumped when i went back to look.
content.summary: Taking pics of a pretty sky.

content.detailedDescription: In backyard taking pictures of chemtrails then after reviewing images saw the blue orb.
content.summary: While taking pic of chemtrails noticed orb

content.detailedDescription: (315) 640-6613 i michael hopkins observed as steven a smiths eyes changed recently into something other than human two minutes and four seconds into a video (please watch closely)i have of him covering a mayweather vs connor mcgregor pre fight interview it's weird and disturbing. me and my older brother located in coco beach florida watched over and over we have studied reptilian shape shifters and we believe this is a example of one.
content.summary: I watched recently as steven a smiths eyes drastically changed briefly during a coverage of connor and mayweather fight i also have the photage

content.detailedDescription: I was doing a video because i like thunderstorms, and i saw something of unbelievable when i saw the record i did
content.summary: First time i see

content.detailedDescription: 5 days ago the stuff on the floof of socal stsrt changing and ive been ln it ever since. the malibu beach base is nothing compared to whats taking places on the pacific and theres alot of green faces down there!  ok i will let you judge for your self the pictures im sending will blow you away with the constrution and art work they have been creating. i have over 500 pics alot of them are fog out so just take a look or get on google after 1am best time  for them lift the curtins up on sea floor.
content.summary: Its happening on google off the shores of huntington beach  for the last five days on the floor bottom 10 miles off shore , and in the backside of catalinas floor bottom .  its from newport to palos verdez . then starts back up on  santa barbra coast. 9

content.detailedDescription: Huge silver/white light (object), changed direction on 90 degree angle, faded quickly. not a satellite... definitely not low enough to be a jet. clear sky, extremely bright. duration less than two minutes.
content.summary: Huge silver/white light object, changed direction on 90degree angle, faded quickly. not a satellite.
